hackathon-eligibility: This hackathon is limited to undergrad students from the following universities: Boston College, Boston University, Northeastern, Harvard, MIT, Tufts, Wellesley, Wentworth, WPI, or Brandeis
hackathon-rules: Teams can be at most 4 participants

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: (Best project made by a group of first-time hackers)
(Hack that creatively tackles or advises a business need)
(Most polished/streamlined user experience and most visually appealing design)
(Hack that most effectively addresses a social need or problem)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Carney Hall, Chestnut Hill, MA 02467, USA
hackathon-location-address: Carney Hall, Chestnut Hill, MA 02467, USA
hackathon-description-header: Approach technology from a multidisciplinary perspective at BC's flagship hackathon
